title: Streamlined Git Style VCS
description: Used Java to create a version-control system that mimics some of the features of Git including active directory moderation, file hashing, merge conflict handling, and remote repository interactions.

title: EmoteWell API
description: Developed an REST API for handling mobile app payment authentication and verification through Apple using Bearer authenticated HTTP requests, public-key cryptography, and SQL for accessing and modifying PHPMyAdmin database.

title: Enigma Machine
description: Applied advanced applications of data structures to redesign the Enigma machine used in WWII with fully functional file encryption and decryption algorithms

title: Scheme Interpereter
description: Used the functional programming language Scheme (a Lisp dialect) in conjunction with Python to write a pseudo-self interpreter and Read-Eval-Print Loop (REPL) environment for Scheme.

title: Italian Restaurant Website Redesign
description: Used HTML, CSS, JS, and PHP to create an updated website for a popular restaurant in Berkeley using data structures, prototype design techniques, and HTTP requests to dynamically populate menu items.

title: Snake (Game)
description: Used C to recreate the popular game Snake with added functionality for parallel snake instances and a fully operational command-line UI.  Added further support for augmented board types including non-unform, non-rectangular boards.
